Bacteria Coliform and E Coli Mitigation

Licensed Bacteria Mitigation Professionals

YOU HAVE BACTERIA IN YOUR WELL WATER!

Don’t Panic! We are here to help you with that. (it’s not that bad and easy to mitigate)

Reasons: House has been sitting with no one living in it. Your well isn’t properly sealed outside. Your well is buried outside. All of these things can lead to bacteria in your well water.

Solutions: Chlorinating the well. Ultra-Violet Light Sterilization. Raise your well casing above ground and properly seal.

*Real-estate transactions are handled with professionalism and with immediate action*

Water Dr. LLC will handle it all. We can figure out the main reason you have bacteria first. From there, we can discuss the best solution for you. Easy to call us and ask questions about it. Click the Number at the top of the page.

If you have no water, don’t hesitate to call us any time.

Our expert plumbers have years of experience with well pumps, both installation and repair. We will have your well running properly in no time.
